text: he; satyavisvasikale, enre satruvum ninnalute satruvum ayittullavareat snehabandham sthapicc keant ninnal avare mitrannalakki vekkarut‌. ninnalkku vannukittiyittulla satyattil avar avisvasiccirikkukayan‌. ninnal ninnalute raksitavaya allahuvil visvasikkunnatinal rasulineyum ninnaleyum avar nattil ninnu purattakkunnu. enre margattil samaram ceyyuvanum enre prititetuvanum ninnal purappettirikkukayanenkil (ninnal aprakaram maitri bandham sthapikkarut‌.) ninnal avarumayi rahasyamayi snehabandham sthapikkunnu. ninnal rahasyamakkiyatum parasyamakkiyatum nan nallavannam ariyunnavanan‌. ninnalil ninn vallavanum aprakaram pravarttikkunna paksam avan nermargattil ninn pilaccu peayirikkunnu
